website_summaries.verdict: Aims to improve circulation, break down the fat and clear out toxins to reduce cellulite.
pros: Contains natural ingredients including gingko biloba and caffeine
Immediate results in tightening and firming the skin
It is especially good at leaving the skin feeling soft and silky
cons: This doesn’t last long, and it’s expensive

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stuff
customer_reviews.text: So I have been using this product for about seven days now regularly. I use it after I shower and again under my waist trainer before workout. I didn't expect to see a difference until two months because that's what they said in the information. But I already see a difference in my skin! I noticed it first on my legs! I love it and will be buying more soon! Can't wait to see more changes!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for the fantastic product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been seen positive results since I started using it. Taking care of cellulite is not a miracle, and I know that I have to be patient. But this cream has facilitated my life a lot. I have recommended that to my friends, and they are so happy. I have read regarding Provilism that it is the more modern ingredients to combat cellulite, I was looking for something like that. Thank you for the fantastic product.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Raphaela

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect much
customer_reviews.text: What really upset me the most is the size of the tube. For $22 I was expecting more. It says use consistently for two months for results, but for 2 months use you could honestly go through about 10 of these. Not worth it. DON'T USE IT BEFORE BED! THE CAFFEINE WAS ABSORBED THROUGH THE SKIN AND KEPT ME UP ALL NIGHT!
customer_reviews.author: 6gr8kids

customer_reviews.title: Nivea has a cellulite gel that works much better.
customer_reviews.text: I used the entire bottle - zero change. It legitimately did no more to help my cellulite than putting regular cream on my legs/backside. I even used a cellulite massager/cup with it and I saw no change. Nivea has a cellulite gel that works much better.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Suprised me!😲
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I've been using a couple of weeks. I was skeptical, usually things like this for me doesn't work for me. No lie, I see something different in my cellulite. I also workout doing Cize. Enough to make purchase again. DEFINITELY
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Hudroxcell Works!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I applied on my cellulite and what a difference!! It was a recommendation of my sister and I must say it works!! I’m impressed with the quality of the cream and the results, even though the directions said best results within two months of continuous use, I see my cellulite reduced already!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The reviews said you could see results in two months. I haven't seen any improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Young

customer_reviews.title: Starting to see results
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this not expecting much, but after applying it once per day for 10 days, I’m starting to see results. My skin looks firmer and smoother. It’s not going to replace diet and exercise, but every little bit helps.
customer_reviews.author: lucky_shamrock

customer_reviews.title: best one I have used
customer_reviews.text: I have never before reviewed a product of this type because really I couldn't tell if anything was ever happening. But this product is very good and excellent if used with roller glove. I have really seen a difference in cellulite on my legs and haven't even used it that long.
customer_reviews.author: athena

customer_reviews.title: Consistent use is key
customer_reviews.text: You have to use it consistently for it to work, and I didn’t. So the results weren’t miraculous but I think if I did use it daily it would have worked better
customer_reviews.author: Ollie

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe this stuff actually works! No it didn’t come close to eliminating my cellulite, but with very little work on my end there is a literal reduction!

customer_reviews.title: Inner seal broken on both purchases
customer_reviews.text: Purchased and inner seal was broken. Exchanged an inner seal was broken AGAIN. Just sent it back for refund.

customer_reviews.title: Skin looks and feels smoother
customer_reviews.text: My skin looked and felt smoother after the first two applications. I will use every day as directed for the next two months and will update results.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My wife had lost a lot of weight. She tried different products none of them worked. She was at her wits end. Found this stuff, bought it for her. She's had it a couple days and she's already seeing results. Will be buying for her again.

customer_reviews.text: Such a small tube for the money. It's hard to tell if the product is working, when you run out of it after only the 4th or 5th application. I'm not gonna buy it again.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: This cream makes my skin GLOW. And smells good. Not happy that my latest shipment arrived in a cracked/damaged jar and was leaking, though.

customer_reviews.title: This product is wonderful! I cannot live without it anymore
customer_reviews.text: This product is wonderful! I cannot live without it anymore! Has helped me reduce significantly my celulites and my skin looks great!

customer_reviews.text: "First cellulite product I've used and saw actual results. By week two I was already seeing results. This stuff is amazing! Added with exercise a couple of times a week and you will see a difference.“

customer_reviews.text: It’s only been a week and no results yet. The smell is odd and reminds me of bug spray. I will not purchase again.

customer_reviews.title: I just like the smell
customer_reviews.text: I didn't see to much difference i guess didn't work on me.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works fine but not like i want it to.but still good.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: This does not work!!! Dont buy it! Too expensive for nothing!

customer_reviews.title: Return it!
customer_reviews.text: I received absolutely ZERO results! My cellulite looks worse, gross!! I returned this product, no thanks!
customer_reviews.author: JessNYC

customer_reviews.title: Freaking Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I was dubious about this but holy crap this stuff works! I did see results after a couple of weeks and they've only gotten better. I used this during a time I wasn't able to go work out regularly and so I can safely say that most of the change I've seen is from this cream. However, I was using it twice a day. The instructions didn't say if it was one or two so I went for it. I'd definitely recommend this! One note: This helps smooth things, it's not a miracle cure. That said, it is amazing how much difference it does make.
customer_reviews.author: Spirited

customer_reviews.title: Works a little
customer_reviews.text: There's really no cream at this time that's going to get rid of cellulite permanently. This does plump up the skin for a while and seems to work for minor cellulite areas, but don't think you're getting a miracle cure here. And you have to use it constantly or your skin goes right back to the way it was...which makes sense. Just don't expect a miracle.
customer_reviews.author: tbear

customer_reviews.title: I think it works
customer_reviews.text: I truly think it works. And I appreciate the new container— more value and easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: prop0017

customer_reviews.title: I will buy again for sure.
customer_reviews.text: I love the products of Botanic Tree. All of them are 100% organic extracts and this for matters a lot. I decided to try this product for cellulite, and I can say no regrets. The cream smells so lovely, and you notice the improvement, the difference when you are using it. I know cellulite depends on our diet and takes time to be free. But I can confirm the cream Hydroxcell has helped me to confront this fight. I will buy again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Steffanie Amorim

customer_reviews.title: I can feel it working!
customer_reviews.text: This is great! I can actually feel this working. I was surprised how tight my skin felt from the moment I put it on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Customer

customer_reviews.title: I will be buying this product for the rest of my life
customer_reviews.text: Cellulite is not something easy, but my life is easier now after using Hydroxcell for sure . I am not saying that I am free without any cellulite, but I can see a big difference in my butt now , after almost 2 months they are correct , we can see a huge progress in our cellulite. I will be buying this product for the rest of my life. Thank you Botanic Tree

customer_reviews.title: Smells AWFUL
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't able to use this long enough to know whether this actually works or not, because it smells almost exactly like very strong bug spray and I couldn't stand smelling like that constantly.

customer_reviews.title: Works great- will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it for about a month and can feel a difference in my skin where I've used it at. I should have taken before pictures so that I can see a difference. That's the only thing I would suggest you do...

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: If you are patient and willing to do as the directions say and use the product for 2 months, then you will be pleased! It really does work! Follow the directions and be patient!

customer_reviews.title: Like it!

customer_reviews.text: I was using this cream for a while and I could tell the difference. My skin is tighter and looks better. I think I will buy another one.

customer_reviews.text: Goes on smoothe. No noticeable improvement after using full tube.

customer_reviews.text: It’s incredible how good this anti cellulite is. I already can see the difference in my legs using it for the past week. I would recommend this product which is trying to get rid of cellulite!!

customer_reviews.title: I will buy again
customer_reviews.text: The best cellulite cream I have used. I will buy again.

customer_reviews.title: I am so glad to find this product
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad to find this product. It works!! but it takes time , and we need to be patient and disciplined to use twice a day every single day at least 2 months.. I will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Ramiro Lopez

customer_reviews.title: I really liked this product
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product, I did my research regarding provilism, and I found out that it is a combination of two ingredients from natural origin from fisetin and frambinone. I love the products of Botanic Tree because they are organics. I know cellulite is something very hard to treat, and this cream is not a miracle, but I have already felt a difference in my skin using it. High recommendation, and I will be using during 2 months as recommended and I will be updated later.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars

customer_reviews.author: NoniC

customer_reviews.title: it feels like it. However
customer_reviews.text: Pleasant citrusy smell... It seems to have a mild tightening effect on the skin. At least, subjectively, it feels like it. However, visually, I saw no effect on cellulite (after using 2 tubes). Does this mean I have to give up chocolate & cake? 😳
customer_reviews.author: Rabbit with watch

customer_reviews.title: A must try!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife to tone her hips and mommy fats after months of giving birth to our baby girl. Aside from making her skin smooth, she also uses this on her thighs and tummy and I can say that some of her cellulite are slowly disappearing. She does some light exercise as well so I think they work both hand in hand effectively. Tube is almost gone and definitely will order again. A must try product if you are looking to shed some of the extra baggage.
customer_reviews.author: Rev_mj

customer_reviews.title: I am in really good shape, just happen to be genetically destined for ...
customer_reviews.text: I used the entire bottle of this cream. Twice a day, lasted almost two weeks. I did a deep tissue massage, spending close to 4/5 minutes a leg. I did not see a reduction of cellulite at all. I am in really good shape, just happen to be genetically destined for dimply legs. I did like the smell and I my legs felt more hydrated but I am still looking like the same container of cottage cheese in my shorties :(
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey

customer_reviews.title: This product would get a five star rating from me ...
customer_reviews.text: This product would get a five star if a) the price was more reasonable and b) the tube was full . I like this product. I think it helps me with my cellulite, but ounce for ounce it is more expensive than many top notch brands that are equally as effective if not more. The tube barely lasts me two weeks. I am not going to buy again. I think they cheat on how much product they put in it.
customer_reviews.author: Afsaneh

customer_reviews.title: Lasted total 19 Days!!!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t really tell if it worked at all because there wasn’t enough time to test it - the bottled lasted 19 Days applied once a day to the stomach, hips and legs. I am 5’8, weigh 120 lb, didn’t use too much product - just enough to cover the areas. For $22 would expect to last it longer. Would need to spend almost $40 a month to use it daily!!!
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my 3rd tube. It doesn't work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely the best anti cellulite cream I have ever used, I've tried few other brands in the past but I haven't seen good result as I did with HydroXcell for the first week. I have to admit , I've noticed difference on my legs, my skin looks smoother and I love the smell, I use it everyday and combine it with workout and healthy diet. I'll continue using for 2 months as suggested to get better results. I will definitely buy it again and I highly recommend to anyone who is looking for great anti cellulite cream!!
customer_reviews.author: AE

customer_reviews.title: Smells good and feels nice but haven't seen any results at ...

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars

customer_reviews.title: I really recommend that product

customer_reviews.title: I only applied on my thys. Barely enough in ...
customer_reviews.text: I only applied on my thys. Barely enough in the tube to last for once a day for 2 weeks. Didn’t see any difference. Not worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: deborah dellasso

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: First off, this stuff smells amazing! It goes on without being greasy and stays on. I haven't been using it long enough to make an informed decision on whether it works for cellulite, stretch marks, etc. but I bought it more for tightening my skin and so far my skin looks great after using it. Really like it and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: CNB

product_meta.title: HydroXCell Anti Cellulite Cream Botanic Tree-Decrease Cellulite in 92% of Customers After 2 Months-Proven Results-100% Organic Extract-Cellulite Cream Remover w/Caffeine,Centella Asiatica,and Gingko.( Packaging may vary)
feature_bullets: CELULITIS TREATMENT- Firming Lotion, cellulite remover combats skin aging, non oily, it absorbs quicker than cellulite oil, double shot coffee and centella asiatica.The best anti cellulite cream ever
CELLULITE REMOVAL CREAM - Acts and Defense at multiple levels of cellulite. It has connective tissue repair, and skin firming."Fat Burner Cream, Cream for Cellulite, Skin Toning Cream”
CELLULITE MASSAGER- Provislim is an important amino acid, without which, fats cannot be burned; thought to be critically important in fat metabolization, speeding fat oxidation (fat-breakdown)
STRETCH MARK CREAM- The antioxidants in coffee may help to release toxins, which is not only helpful for cellulite, but for healthy skin in general." Fat burning cream, stretch mark removal"

MADE IN USA- Cruelty-Free- Satisfaction Guarantee, works or your money back.Slimming cream,bum bum cream,firming cream,caffeine cream,toning cream,stomach tightening cream,anticellulite products, crema reductora y quema grasa.
